name: Adult Void Dragon
description: The Adult Void Dragon is a massive dragon characterized by its impressive natural armor and formidable presence. It embodies chaos and the mysterious nature of the void.
memorable: Its ability to inflict short-term madness and its powerful breath weapon options make it a uniquely challenging adversary.
goals: To dominate its territory and impose chaos on its foes.
relations: Often associated with other chaotic creatures, might serve or oppose beings of the void.
environment: Typically found in places of chaos or the void, distant realms, or ancient lairs.
strengths: High hit points and formidable saving throws, along with powerful cold damage capabilities.
weaknesses: Limited mobility when not airborne and reliance on effective saving throws.
attacks: Includes a terrifying multiattack that can disrupt opponents' minds and unleash physical destruction.
most_powerful_ability: Chill of the Void allows its cold damage to bypass resistance.
senses: Has blindsight out to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 21.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and History, showcasing its extensive knowledge.
additional_information: Can manipulate reality to redirect attacks with its Void Twist ability.
Possesses the ability to travel immense distances easily with Expert Void Traveler.
Can cause devastating area effects with its breath weapons, Gravitic Breath and Stellar Breath.
test_queries: intimidating dragon with powerful breath attack
